tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmissionsData (
 data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 supplier_id INT,
 emission_date DATE,
 emission_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
 FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SupplierCategories (
 supplier_id INT,
 category_id INT,
 PRIMARY KEY (supplier_id, category_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES EmissionCategories(category_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Suppliers (supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY, supplier_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE EmissionsData (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, supplier_id INT NOT NULL, emission_value DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, report_date DATE NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE SupplierAddresses (address_id INT PRIMARY KEY, supplier_id INT NOT NULL, address_line1 VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE EmissionCategories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE SupplierContacts (contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY, supplier_id INT NOT NULL, contact_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL);
